faqs.answer: Yes Non-Resident Indians are fully permitted to purchase residential and commercial property including plots in India subject to FEMA regulations. We recommend taking photographs and verifying the plot number against the official maps ensuring the plot for sale aligns perfectly with the legal documents provided.
